00004 
00005 #ifndef HAVE_UNLINK
00006 
00007 int unlink(const char *pathname)
00008 {
00009     #if OS_WIN
00010     return DeleteFile(pathname) ? 0 /* success */: -1 /* failure */;
00011     #else
00012     #error "unimplemented"
00013     #endif
00014 }
00015 
00016 #else
00017 #include <unistd.h>
00018 int unlink(const char *);
00019 #endif
